author: Derek Lawrence
title: New Girl on Netflix is the perfect coronavirus quarantine binge
description: During this weird and uncertain time, there's something soothing about spending 146 episodes with a bunch of lovable weirdos.
content:
Youths unite!
Like many people around the globe, I recently found myself self-quarantined at home and doing what we do best: binging television shows. Now, I've seen essentially every series that I have any interest in. And that's not a brag, it's actually a… [+4980 chars]
